participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and adventurous, enjoys trying new activities and cherishes family time.
participant_1.background: I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family. I am an anime fan. I often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for Justin Bieber. I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older. I work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: ambitious and creative, always looking for ways to express themselves and connect with others.
participant_2.background: I'm trying to make my parents proud by singing to their clients, but it's not easy. I am an entrepreneur who is passionate about using social media to grow my business. My favorite color is blue. I went to college in Chicago. I enjoy reading about health issues to learn more about my body and how to take care of it.

content.text: Doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
Doing great! I just got back from swimming in the lake with my family.
That sounds like fun! I miss swimming. I used to love going to the lake with my family when I was younger.
What do you do for fun now?
I sing to my parents' clients at their business. It's not easy, but I'm trying to make them proud.
That's cool! I'm an anime fan, so I love listening to music from anime.
I love anime too! What's your favorite anime?
My favorite anime is Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood. It's such a great story with amazing characters.
I've never seen that one. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's one of the best animes ever made.
Awesome! I'll add it to my list.
Cool! Let me know what you think of it.
